rows.name: Dagger of Lifekeeping
rows.notes: +1 defending dagger; while wielded wearer gains +2 resistance bonus on all saves; 1/day when first drawn grants 1d10+10 temp hp (lasts up to 10 hours).
rows.required_spells: resistance; false life; shield OR shield of faith

rows.name: Ghost Gauntlet
rows.notes: Weapons gripped gain ghost touch; wearer’s hand/gauntlet portions can become incorporeal for fine manipulation (+5 competence on Disable Device and Open Lock); 1/day teleport object effect to Ethereal Plane.

rows.name: Ring of Greater Counterspells
rows.notes: Holds one spell (1st–6th) like ring of counterspells; 1/day wearer may counter a seen spell within 100 ft as an immediate action (as dispel magic counterspell) at wearer’s CL (max +20), no Spellcraft needed.
rows.required_spells: imbue with spell ability; dispel magic

rows.name: Ring of Mental Fortitude
rows.notes: Wearer is protected against all mind-affecting spells/abilities with no saving throws required (they fail to affect her).

rows.name: Conduit Rod
rows.notes: 3/day standard action; choose acid/cold/electricity/fire/sonic; for 1 round, wielder and adjacent creatures treat existing resistance to chosen type as 20 lower (no effect on immunity).

rows.name: Magic Siphon
rows.notes: 1/day standard action; each adjacent creature affected as by targeted greater dispel magic (CL 20th).

rows.name: Rod of Avoidance
rows.notes: 3/day standard action; grants +20 deflection bonus to AC until start of wielder’s next action.

rows.name: Rod of Grievous Wounds
rows.notes: 5/day standard action; each adjacent creature with fewer than max HP takes 1d8 damage.

rows.name: Rod of Sure Striking
rows.notes: 3/day standard action; every creature adjacent to wielder gains +10 on its next attack roll before wielder’s next turn.

rows.name: Soul Anchor
rows.notes: 3/day standard action; each adjacent creature DC 18 Will or becomes unable to move from current 5-ft space (not paralyzed/entangled); can spend a standard action each round to retry save; involuntary movement ends effect.

rows.name: Bracelets of Spell Sharing
rows.notes: Paired bracelets; while both are worn by different creatures within 60 ft, any personal-range spell with target “you” affects both (duration halved; fails if <1 round). Only one shared spell at a time.
rows.required_spells: share spell ability OR shield other

rows.name: Casting Glove
rows.notes: Stores one item ≤20 lb as glove of storing; 1/round can use stored potion/rod/scroll/staff/wand without retrieving; using rod/staff/wand expends charges normally; using does not provoke AoOs.

rows.name: Daazzix’s Vest
rows.notes: Functions only for a wearer who already has spell resistance; increases existing spell resistance by 5.

rows.name: Domain Draught
rows.notes: Elixir; on drinking, user gains access to the associated cleric domain for 24 hours (granted power; domain spell access if applicable).

rows.name: Elixir of Reckoning
rows.notes: Elixir; if the imbiber dies within 1 hour of imbibing, body explodes for 5d6 damage in 20-ft radius (Ref DC 14 half); if not slain within 1 hour, no effect. Variant 10d6 exists at higher price.

rows.name: Lenses of Pain
rows.notes: While active (limited total rounds/day), creatures within 30 ft each round Will DC 16 or take 2d6 damage and become sickened (save halves and negates sickened); avert eyes to avoid; can focus gaze as standard action on one target.

rows.name: Lenses of True Form
rows.notes: Wearer sees true forms of shapechangers or creatures under transmutation shapechange effects; 1/day force one shapeshifted creature within 30 ft to resume natural form (Will DC 14 negates; 2d4 rounds lockout). Donning both lenses required.
rows.required_spells: true seeing; dispel magic OR greater dispel magic

rows.name: Mantle of Second Chances
rows.notes: 1/day the wearer rerolls a just-made roll before success/failure is declared; must take the reroll result.

rows.name: Quill of Rapid Scrivening
rows.notes: 10-minute use; copies a deciphered wizard-list scroll directly to a prepared blank spellbook page (scroll becomes blank). Grants +10 competence bonus on Forgery checks.

rows.name: Riding Boots
rows.notes: While mounted, +4 on Ride checks in combat; gains Ride-By Attack; if wearer has Spirited Charge, lance charge crits deal ×4 instead of ×3.

rows.name: Robe of the Inferno
rows.notes: Continuously grants +4 armor bonus; while active grants fire resistance 10 and faerie fire outline to nearby invisible foes; 2/day launch a fiery orb (ranged touch ≤60 ft) that explodes for 8d6 fire in 5-ft radius (Fort DC 16 half/no dazzle on success) and outlines targets.
